basic_node.title: Plasma oscillations of object part material
basic_node.description: Plasma oscillations being oscillations of the charge density within a material.
basic_node.references: [sp47, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-642-10523-4, p.93.] [sp48, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-642-10523-4, p.95.] [sp46, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp46, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271612000378, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp46, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-12352-3_18, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two. See p.415.]
